version_description:
We’ve fixed several issues with the app that you may have noticed. First, if you’re on a 4G network, attaching an E-Card may have been slow. Second, notifications sometimes remain on the app badge on your home screen. Both of these are corrected with this update.

Good news - VideoGram service has been restored in Ohio! If you sent a VideoGram before the service was interrupted, it will be delivered once it has been approved.

We’ve fixed several issues with the app that you may have noticed. First, if you’re on a 4G network, attaching an E-Card may have been slow. Second, notifications sometimes remain on the app badge on your home screen. Both of these are corrected with this update.

Good news - VideoGram service has been restored in Ohio! If you sent a VideoGram before the service was interrupted, it will be delivered once it has been approved.

This month we fixed a few bugs with notifications, VideoGrams, and the app in general.  You should now get a correct count of new emails and VideoGrams when you glance at the app badge before opening it, and we corrected some errors with the camera.  We also optimized the app for the current version of iOS.

This month we fixed a few bugs with notifications, VideoGrams, and the app in general.  You should now get a correct count of new emails and VideoGrams when you glance at the app badge before opening it, and we corrected some errors with the camera.  We also optimized the app for the current version of iOS.
The big update this month: you can now fund your loved one’s JPay media account (where available) with the app!  We also fixed a couple of bugs and updated our terms and conditions.
The big update this month: you can now fund your loved one’s JPay media account (where available) with the app!  We also fixed a couple of bugs and updated our terms and conditions.

Just a couple of updates and bug fixes this month – first, we modified the way some information is displayed so you can see more of what you’re doing on the app.  We also added a notification alerting you when you’re about to send a VideoGram to a recipient without access to a kiosk.

Just a couple of updates and bug fixes this month – first, we modified the way some information is displayed so you can see more of what you’re doing on the app.  We also added a notification alerting you when you’re about to send a VideoGram to a recipient without access to a kiosk.

We made a few improvements we think you’ll appreciate.  We upgraded the app’s address and age verification system, fixed an issue that was rotating the image on selfies, and enabled the prepaid reply function for emails.  We also fixed a couple of bugs that ate up memory and updated some product designs and terminology.

We made a few improvements we think you’ll appreciate.  We upgraded the app’s address and age verification system, fixed an issue that was rotating the image on selfies, and enabled the prepaid reply function for emails.  We also fixed a couple of bugs that ate up memory and updated some product designs and terminology.

We made a couple of modifications this month to prevent memory crashes and issues with account information, and we changed the display order of your VideoGram stream so you see the newest ones first.  We also redesigned the eCard feature and fixed a few other bugs.

We made a couple of modifications this month to prevent memory crashes and issues with account information, and we changed the display order of your VideoGram stream so you see the newest ones first.  We also redesigned the eCard feature and fixed a few other bugs.

We are aware that some users were experiencing issues with the app after updating. While we fix these issues, we are making the previous version of the app available in the App Store for you to download. The new features from our latest update will be available soon.

We are aware that some users were experiencing issues with the app after updating. While we fix these issues, we are making the previous version of the app available in the App Store for you to download. The new features from our latest update will be available soon.

This month we made some security upgrades and redesigned the eCards section of the Email function.  We also fixed some issues with photo/video attachments, email contacts, the help section, and account information.

This month we made some security upgrades and redesigned the eCards section of the Email function.  We also fixed some issues with photo/video attachments, email contacts, the help section, and account information.

This month we made a few changes that will make it easier to create an account and validate your email address.  We also fixed some bugs that were causing redundancies like multiple app-update popups.

This month we made a few changes that will make it easier to create an account and validate your email address.  We also fixed some bugs that were causing redundancies like multiple app-update popups.
One big fix with this update – we have restored media account funding!  You can now resume sending funds to your loved one’s media account through the app.
One big fix with this update – we have restored media account funding!  You can now resume sending funds to your loved one’s media account through the app.

This month we fixed bugs that caused various problems: app crashes, messages not appearing in the sent folder, VideoGram orientation issues and account issues.  We should be good now… until next month :)

This month we fixed bugs that caused various problems: app crashes, messages not appearing in the sent folder, VideoGram orientation issues and account issues.  We should be good now… until next month :)

First the big news – you can now use your Discover card to send money and purchase stamps!  Also this month, we fixed some issues with the way text and special characters are displayed, and updated the procedures related to “blocked” recipients.

First the big news – you can now use your Discover card to send money and purchase stamps!  Also this month, we fixed some issues with the way text and special characters are displayed, and updated the procedures related to “blocked” recipients.

This update has a big new feature for the new year - Snap n’ Send, which allows you to send a photo without having to attach it to an email!  Check it out; we think you’ll love it.  We also fixed a couple of bugs with the VideoGram service that occasionally caused the app to crash.

This update has a big new feature for the new year - Snap n’ Send, which allows you to send a photo without having to attach it to an email!  Check it out; we think you’ll love it.  We also fixed a couple of bugs with the VideoGram service that occasionally caused the app to crash.

This month, we added a stamp transfer history section to the Email feature and improved the way drafts are displayed.  We also fixed a couple of bugs that sometimes resulted in duplicate emails and/or app crashes.

This month, we added a stamp transfer history section to the Email feature and improved the way drafts are displayed.  We also fixed a couple of bugs that sometimes resulted in duplicate emails and/or app crashes.

This month’s updates include general bug fixes and improvements to the stamp purchasing and email composition processes.  Additionally, we’ve fixed issues associated with certain images - now you can see all images clearly.

This month’s updates include general bug fixes and improvements to the stamp purchasing and email composition processes.  Additionally, we’ve fixed issues associated with certain images - now you can see all images clearly.

This month you'll notice a change to the app's home page; it now reflects the products and services that are available to you and your loved ones.  We also streamlined the login/registration process and added in-app notifications, in addition to improving the email composition process and fixing other bugs.

This month you'll notice a change to the app's home page; it now reflects the products and services that are available to you and your loved ones.  We also streamlined the login/registration process and added in-app notifications, in addition to improving the email composition process and fixing other bugs.
